title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still no success.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button is unresponsive on all browsers.

title: Database Connection Intermittent Failure
description: The main production database is experiencing intermittent connection drops, affecting all services. Need to escalate immediately.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode Toggle
description: User requested a persistent dark mode option in the settings panel for late-night use. Low priority enhancement.

title: Billing Incorrectly Charged Twice
description: Received two charges for the monthly subscription on the same day. Requires immediate financial review and refund processing.

title: Broken Link on Homepage Header
description: The 'Pricing' link in the main navigation bar returns a 404 error when clicked. Needs correction before marketing campaign launch.

title: Mobile App Crashing on iOS 17
description: Reported crash upon opening the mobile application on all devices running the latest iOS 17 update. Major user experience issue.

title: Request to Change Email Address
description: User requested to update the primary email address on their account from old@example.com to new@example.com.

title: Search Bar Filter Malfunction
description: When applying the 'Date Range' filter in the main search bar, the results do not update correctly and causes lag.

title: Incorrect Sales Tax Calculation
description: A specific subset of users in California is being charged the wrong sales tax rate during checkout. Immediate fix needed for compliance.

title: Missing Documentation for API v3
description: The publicly available API documentation is missing the reference section for all new endpoints introduced in API version 3.

title: Suggestion: Add Export to CSV Option
description: Customer requested an option to export the data grid contents directly to a CSV file from the reporting dashboard for offline analysis.
